mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, message AS title, type, message AS content, created_at AS createdAt FROM Bg_Alarm WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 50
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bg_Alarm (user_id, type, message, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{content}, datetime('now', 'localtime'))
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(a.id) AS id, a.type, a.message AS content, a.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(a.user_id) AS userCount, CASE WHEN COUNT(a.user_id) > 1 THEN NULL ELSE MAX(u.login_id) END AS userLoginId, MAX(a.user_id) AS userId FROM Bg_Alarm a LEFT JOIN Bg_User u ON a.user_id = u.id GROUP BY a.message, a.created_at, a.type ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM Bg_Alarm GROUP BY message, created_at, type ) AS temp_table
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bg_Alarm (user_id, type, message, created_at) SELECT id, #{type}, #{content}, datetime('now', 'localtime') FROM Bg_User
